c3eb1ff5-7ec2-474b-a0aa-3085eff2cbba.name: Frequency: Constantly
c3eb1ff5-7ec2-474b-a0aa-3085eff2cbba.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

369ed12a-5f0f-42ae-808c-dca820403cc4.name: Frequency: Hourly
369ed12a-5f0f-42ae-808c-dca820403cc4.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

f8ad6f60-b86d-4d62-9a26-4fcba94b27f0.name: Frequency: Daily
f8ad6f60-b86d-4d62-9a26-4fcba94b27f0.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

1f0f9ef1-3687-48f6-99bc-f6ae074b4093.name: Frequency: Weekly
1f0f9ef1-3687-48f6-99bc-f6ae074b4093.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

469edb91-704b-44b6-b761-9a7950ad0eb2.name: Frequency: Monthly
469edb91-704b-44b6-b761-9a7950ad0eb2.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

106ef009-08c1-4309-88f2-5d719bb05a14.name: Frequency: Seasonally
106ef009-08c1-4309-88f2-5d719bb05a14.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

be3cc359-ef0b-4bbb-bde8-2414f8e453bd.name: Frequency: Yearly
be3cc359-ef0b-4bbb-bde8-2414f8e453bd.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

f2ae5f93-5b6d-4c96-88ca-3a9ae952f5a1.name: Aging
f2ae5f93-5b6d-4c96-88ca-3a9ae952f5a1.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency
